pages.text:
About WVSC
Welcome to The West Volusia Saddle Club: where our guiding principle is “Inspiring better horsemanship in the present & for the future through community involvement”.
Our physical address is:
West Volusia Saddle Club
321 Pleasant St
Lake Helen, FL 32744
Our mailing address is:
West Volusia Saddle Club
PO Box 186
Lake Helen, FL 32744
Our e-mail address is WVSCBoard@gmail.com
The West Volusia Saddle Club is a dynamic horsemanship club located in beautiful Lake Helen, Florida, approximately 30 minutes north of Orlando.  We have been a non-profit club since 1967 and serve the community of West Volusia county through events that cater to those who love equines.  Our organization is governed by By-Laws and Riding rules, both of which are reviewed, revised, and agreed upon by the general membership at our January club meeting.  Copies of these are available on our forms page.
Membership
Membership is $40 for one person, with an additional $5 for each member, up to 5 members on a single membership.  Youth under age 18 must join with a parent or legal guardian.  We welcome members and potential members to our monthly membership meetings which are held at Lake Helen City Hall (327 S. Lakeview Dr., Lake Helen, FL 32744) on the second Monday of each month at 7 p.m.  Make your voice heard in guiding our club to new ideas and improvements!
Sponsorship
We rely on our amazing network of community sponsors to make our club one of the best shows around!  Potential sponsors can select from several sponsorship levels and are actively advertised at each show and on our website. Sponsorship applications can be found on our forms page.
West Volusia Saddle Club Board of Directors – 2025
Our current board of directors for 2025 is as follows:
President:
Brooke Wehr
Vice President:
April Knight
Secretary:
Adele Hunt
Treasurer:
Marion Rettinger
Points Keeper:
Christine Jarvis
Arena Manager:
Melanie Arbogast
Alternate Directors:
Pamela Sackett, Brenna French and Michelle Wehr
Facebook
